description: Details required by Condition 7 (Sustainable Drainage  Systems) of planning permission PP/20/000632 (Erection of rear lower ground floor extension together with associated changes to light-wells and landscape areas; internal excavation (350mm approximately) to increase floor to ceiling height and daylight levels in lower ground floor and associated changes to rear garden light-wells and garden areas; side elevation alterations: including replacement of existing shed with new structure of similar volume and enlargement of existing window at lower ground floor level (northern elevation); replacement of existing roof structure with new roof with same volume, profile and materiality (all to match existing) and new roof-lights; replacement of existing windows with new double -glazed windows to match existing)
